ai-tika-vin07t7:1_0: The first training rule on what is intended
ai-tika-vin07t7:2_1: In the first part of the offenses entailing acknowledgment should be teach the Dhamma in the first to the ninth one.
ai-tika-vin07t7:2_2: Through this mark of a number of offenses he should be teach Dhamma in the presence of the Teacher, and is able to confess it.
ai-tika-vin07t7:2_4: “After attaining a person who has committed an offense entailing acknowledgment, this is how several generation.”
ai-tika-vin07t7:2_5: And the one who thinks he can go into the presence of the Buddha. ...
ai-tika-vin07t7:2_6: For it is due to surely a league.”
ai-tika-vin07t7:2_8: Regular monks standing in inhabited areas with their hands covering over as if within arm’s reach of the door frame.
ai-tika-vin07t7:3_0: The first training rule on acknowledgment is finished.
ai-tika-vin07t7:4_1: Having given the second full ordination in the midst of Puṇṇaka, it is time for eating without taking leave.
ai-tika-vin07t7:5_1: In the third (discourse in the third kind of family) possessed of the three watches of the night, namely, sickness, and the rest.
ai-tika-vin07t7:6_1: if, without getting permission from the fourth absorption, one who is not sick and without being invited to accept two, one who is not sick and without having received it inside that monastery;
ai-tika-vin07t7:7_0: The search for an offense entailing acknowledgment is finished.
